message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I value at $15,000. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $10,500.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest. While $10,500 is lower than I'd hoped, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. Let's meet in the middle!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11,500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about $11,000?  I'm really keen on this product and I think we can make this work.
